content: buffalo plaid a true canadian look brim of hat is knit long enough to double it up and the stranded colourwork adds an extra layer for a truly cozy winter toque knit using 4 colours of dk yarn pattern includes 3 sizes of toque for every member of the family yarn 4 skeins estelle double knit 250m 273 yards /100 g 50% acrylic 40% wool 10% nylon colour 1 c1 silver heather q65580 colour 2 c2 black q65505 colour 3 c3 merlot q65506 colour 4 c4 cardinal q65507 gauge 30 sts by 27 row equal 4 by 4 in 2 x 2 rib with smaller needles after blocking needles 3 5 mm us 4 16 circular needles 4 5 mm us 7 16 circular needles 4 5 mm us 7 double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge notions stitch markers darning needle finished sizes measurements taken unstretched baby/toddler 9 5 tall 13 circumference youth/ ladies small 10 75 tall 14 circumference ladies large/men 13 tall 16 circumference note 4 skeins of estelle double knit is enough to make 4 toques total 1 men s 2 youth and 1 toddler
